Liquidity 2026 รวมสถาบันชั้นนำเพื่อพูดคุยเกี่ยวกับอนาคตของตลาดหลายสินทรัพย์

Liquidity 2026 Gathers Leading Institutions to Discuss the Future of Multi-Asset Markets

13h ago//AMBCrypto Team
defi
AI

Summary

TH

LTP Hong Kong จะเปิดฉากการประชุมสุดยอดระดับสถาบัน "Liquidity 2026" ในวันที่ 9 กุมภาพันธ์ ณ โรงแรม JW Marriott Hotel ฮ่องกง โดยมุ่งรวบรวมตัวแทนจาก hedge funds, ธนาคาร และผู้เชี่ยวชาญด้านตลาด เพื่อหารือเกี่ยวกับการพัฒนาตลาดหลายสินทรัพย์และการบูรณาการระหว่างการเงินแบบดั้งเดิมกับดิจิทัลสินทรัพย์ งานนี้ซึ่งจัดขึ้นเป็นปีที่สี่ มีเป้าหมายเพื่อเชื่อมช่องว่างระหว่าง TradFi และตลาดดิจิทัลสินทรัพย์ โดยเน้นที่นวัตกรรมด้านโครงสร้างพื้นฐานและการยอมรับในระดับสถาบัน วาระการประชุมครอบคลุมหัวข้อสำคัญ เช่น การดำเนินการเทรด, clearing, custody และการจัดการความเสี่ยง รวมถึงหัวข้อเชิงวิเคราะห์อย่าง market convergence และการใช้สินทรัพย์ทุกประเภทเป็นหลักประกัน เช่น staked assets, RWAs, stablecoins และ tokenized credit งานนี้ได้รับการสนับสนุนจากผู้สนับสนุนรายใหญ่ในอุตสาหกรรม เช่น Bitstamp by Robinhood, AWS, Kraken, Fireblocks และ CME Group

EN

LTP Hong Kong is hosting its flagship institutional summit, Liquidity 2026, on February 9 at the JW Marriott Hotel. The event brings together leaders from hedge funds, banks, and market makers to discuss the evolution of multi-asset markets and the integration of digital assets into the global financial system. Now in its fourth year, the summit aims to bridge traditional finance with digital asset markets, focusing on infrastructure innovation and institutional adoption. The agenda covers critical themes such as trade execution, clearing, custody, and risk management, alongside forward-looking topics like market convergence and the collateralization of assets including RWAs and stablecoins. The event is supported by major industry sponsors such as Bitstamp by Robinhood, AWS, Kraken, Fireblocks, and CME Group, highlighting strong institutional interest in the sector.

Key Points

  • Liquidity 2026 takes place on February 9 in Hong Kong, connecting institutional leaders to discuss multi-asset markets and digital assets.
  • Key topics include trade execution, custody, risk management, and the integration of RWAs, stablecoins, and tokenization.
  • Major sponsors include Bitstamp by Robinhood, AWS, Kraken, Fireblocks, and CME Group.

Article

contributor Posted: February 6, 2026 With just over a week until the event, LTP Hong Kong’s flagship institutional summit, Liquidity 2026 , is set to take place on February 9 at the JW Marriott Hotel in Hong Kong. This year’s summit will bring together institutional representatives from hedge funds, market makers, high-frequency trading firms, family offices, asset managers, exchanges, custodians, banks, and technology service providers for a full day of networking and discussions. Attendees will share practical insights and observations on the development of multi-asset markets, and explore the evolving integration of the global financial system with digital assets, tokenization, and multi-asset market infrastructure. Now in its fourth consecutive year, the Liquidity Summit has evolved into a leading institutional dialogue platform bridging traditional finance and digital asset markets. The event continues to advance institutional adoption and infrastructure innovation, contributing to the development of a more open, efficient, and trusted global liquidity network. This year’s agenda focuses on the institutionalization of the digital asset ecosystem and will cover a range of forward-looking and practical themes. Topics span critical areas including trade execution, clearing and custody, risk management, and capital efficiency — directly address the core challenges faced by global institutions in the multi-asset era. New opportunities in multi-asset trading and market convergence The New Settlement Layer: Clearing, Custody & Interoperability Across Markets Building market infrastructure for the next billion investors Insights on institutional capital flow and allocation trends Trading Is Merging — How Institutional Liquidity Is Bridged, Priced, and Risk-Managed Establishing institutional rails for the digital asset economy Everything is collateralizable: staked assets, RWAs, stablecoins, and tokenized credit Crypto After the Hype: What Stayed, What Left, What’s Next The summit has garnered strong support from some of the world’s leading institutions, market infrastructure providers, and industry organizations. Silver sponsors include Bitstamp by Robinhood, AWS, SGX, Kraken, Ceffu, and Fireblocks, underscoring the deep institutional investment in trading, custody, cloud services, and market infrastructure. Bronze sponsors such as BitMEX, Anchorage, Komainu, ABEX, Gold-i, Pyth Network, Talos, Avelacom, Elwood, Equinix, Sundial, Keyblock, and A-Field Tech represent key expertise in areas such as execution, connectivity, custody, risk management, and institutional trading technology. Furthermore, Liquidity 2026 benefits from special support from partners like CME Group, as well as supporting partners including HKSI, InvestHK, CFA Institute, AIMA, and the FinTech Association of Hong Kong (FTAHK). The event is also backed by ecosystem partners such as EDX, Alibaba Cloud, Arctic, ClearToken, Certik and AlfaR, collectively contributing to the creation of a comprehensive institutional dialogue on the future of multi-asset and digital market infrastructure. Liquidity 2026 aims to provide institutional participants with a platform for meaningful exchange and discussions. The summit will offer pragmatic insights on the structural shifts in global markets and facilitate in-depth conversations among diverse stakeholders, paving the way for forward-thinking dialogues on market trading infrastructure, capital allocation, and risk management. About LTP LTP is a global institutional prime broker, purpose-built to meet the evolving needs of digital asset market participants. By applying traditional financial standards to blockchain innovation, LTP provides end-to-end prime services spanning trade execution, clearing, settlement, custody, and financing. Its offerings further extend to institutional asset management, regulated OTC block trading, and compliant on/off-ramp solutions — delivering a secure and scalable foundation for institutions across the digital asset ecosystem. LiquidityTech Limited is an HK SFC licensed for Type 1, 2, 4, 5, and 9 regulated activities. Liquidity Technology Limited is BVI FSC licensed to act as a Virtual Asset Service Provider and licensed under SIBA for dealing in investment activities. Liquidity Technology S.L. is registered with the Bank of Spain as a Virtual Asset Service Provider. Liquidity Fintech Pty Ltd AUSTRAC registered for digital currency exchange, remittance, and foreign exchange service provider. Liquidity Fintech Investment Limited is BVI FSC licensed to provide investment management services. Neutrium Trust Limited is registered as a Trust Company under the Trustee Ordinance and licensed as a Trust or Company Service Provider under AMLO. Liquidity Fintech FZE, granted In-Principle Approval (IPA) by the Dubai VARA for a VASP licence (note: IPA does not permit regulated activities). Disclaimer: All regulated activities are performed exclusively by the relevant entities that are duly licensed or registered, and strictly within the boundaries of their respective regulatory approvals and jurisdictions. More details: https://www.liquiditytech.com Event Details Date: February 9, 2026 (Monday) Time: 8:00 – 17:30 Venue: JW Marriott Hotel Hong Kong Official Website: https://summit.liquiditytech.com Media Contact Elaine Wang media@liquiditytech.com Disclaimer: This is an Event Partner post and should not be treated as news/advice.
